title: Android app deals of the day: Monster Hunter Stories, Peppa Pig, NetX Tools PRO, more
content:
All of Monday’s best Android app deals have now been organized for you down below the fold. Our Google Play game and app price drops are joined by new offers on Samsung’s latest Galaxy S22+/Ultra and Fossil’s latest Gen 6 Wear OS Smartwatch, but for now we are focused on the software. Headliner deals include Monster Hunter Stories, Peppa Pig: Theme Park, Rusty Lake Hotel, NetX Network Tools PRO, Underworld Office, and much more. Hit the jump for a complete look at today’s best Android game and app deals. 

more…
